FieldID.Description: Flag to check enable of the SW stats

FieldID.Name: Exposure Time
FieldID.Description: The exposure time in nanoseconds used by sensor

FieldID.Name: Linear Gain
FieldID.Description: The total gain consumed by sensor only

FieldID.Name: Sensitivity
FieldID.Description: The total exposure including exposure time and gain

FieldID.Name: Delta EV From Target
FieldID.Description: The current exposure delta compared with the desired target

FieldID.Name: Exposure Info
FieldID.Description: Exposure info including gain and exposure time

FieldID.Name: Lux Index
FieldID.Description: Future frame lux index, consumed by ISP

FieldID.Name: Flash Info
FieldID.Description: Flash information if it is main or preflash

FieldID.Name: Preflash State
FieldID.Description: Preflash state from AEC, consumed by Sensor

FieldID.Name: LED Currents
FieldID.Description: The LED currents value for the use case of LED snapshot

FieldID.Name: CCM Override Enabled
FieldID.Description: Flag indicates if CCM override is enabled

FieldID.Name: CCM Offsets
FieldID.Description: The offsets for color correction matrix
